ygData.subject: Re: Thex Mallet
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea Dark Reaver is 2handed.  Those swords can do some nice damage, but I m still at a toss up point.  Right now I m using the Stilletto Bloodclaw which is MUCH
ygData.messageBody:
Yea Dark Reaver is 2handed. Those swords can do some nice damage, but I'm
still at a toss up point. Right now I'm using the Stilletto Bloodclaw which
is MUCH faster. And at level 22, with Vampiric Embrace, I have that and the
BloodClaw effect going off a lot. Hence the trade off. If I go for just
staight Damage, I high with my 2hsword for about 47max, so I get double
attacks of 40 and 42 quite commonly. But at the same time, when you miss,
it's a long recycle time.

Princess Xaera
High Priestess of Innoruuk

____________________________________________
> Granted having 1HS maxed for the Dark Reaver is the
> way
> to go, but at 35th level to get that blade, I won't
> be
> using 1 HS! Back to topic....
>

DR is 2H slashing
